subheading: This wallet is a fork of MEW which is a free, client-side interface helping you interact with EVM blockchains. Our easy-to-use, open-source platform allows you to generate wallets, interact with smart contracts, and so much more.
obtainAddress: Obtain a XERO address and generate your private key. Saving and safekeeping the key will be your responsibility.
accessMyWalletDesc: Send or swap your XERO and tokens, interact with smart contracts, Deploy nodes and more! This is where the magic happens.
aboutSubheading: EVM blockchains at your fingertips. We are a team of crypto-enthusiasts dedicated to bring you the most secure, most intuitive, and dare we say prettiest way to manage your XERO and ERC-20 tokens.
aboutMewWalletDesc: Access any EVMs blockchains original and most-trusted wallet client, now with a host of new features all contained in an elegant, easy-to-use interface.
aboutHardwareWalletDesc: MEW offers support for all major hardware wallets including Ledger, Trezor, and many more.
aboutSwapDesc: MEW has partnered with Bity, Kyber Network, Changelly, and Simplex to allow users to swap fiat to crypto, ETH and BTC, ETH and ERC-20.
aboutMewConnectDesc: MEW's companion app brings hardware-wallet style security to your iOS or Android smartphone, helping you to secure your funds as never before.
faqsSubheading: Have not found the question that you are looking for?
socialSubheading: Get in the know and see your balance grow (we hope)!
howToCreateWalletTitle: How do I create a new wallet?
howToCreateWalletDesc: This wallet is a fork of MEW, which offers three ways to create a new ETH & XERO wallet.
whatIsMewConnectDesc: MEWconnect is our companion mobile app for MyEtherWallet. We call it a hardware wallet without all the hardware. Now available for all Android and iOS smartphones! Read more
workingWOtherWalletsTitle: Can MEW work with other wallets?
workingWOtherWalletsDesc: MEW supports many different wallet types including hardware wallets, such as the Ledger Nano S or Trezor, and third-party wallets like MetaMask. We are also open for anyone to use their Ethereum wallets with the appropriate information. Read more
howToSendTxTitle: How can I send a transaction?
howToSendTxDesc: MEW lets anyone with a balance of ETH or ERC20 tokens send a transaction, without additional charges. Using the Ethereum blockchain takes gas, which is paid for in ETH, so we recommend having at least .01 ETH to cover around 2 - 3 transactions. Read more
forgotPasswordPrivKeyTitle: I forgot my password/private key! What can I do?
forgotPasswordPrivKeyDesc: We do not offer support to recover or reset passwords/private keys. We always suggest writing down private keys and passwords on physical paper/notebooks for safekeeping. Maybe you saved it on your computer! For ideas on what to look for, read more
welcomeTov5: Welcome to Xerom's New Web-Wallet a proud fork of MEW!
welcomeToV5Desc1: Welcome to the brand new MEW! If this is your first time visiting, check out our {0}.
welcomeToV5Desc2: The Vintage MEW fork has been removed.
